content: पृष्ठं [पृष् स्पृश्-वा थक् नि°; <ls>Uṇ. 2. 12</ls>] {@--1@} The back, hinder part, rear. {@--2@} The back of an animal; अश्वपृष्ठमारूढः &c. {@--3@} The surface or upper side; <ls>R. 4. 31</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 67</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 51</ls>; so अवनिपृष्ठचारिणीं <ls>U. 3.</ls> {@--4@} The back or the other side (of a letter, document &c.); <ls>Y. 2. 93.</ls> {@--5@} The flat roof of a house. {@--6@} The page of a book. (पृष्ठेन, पृष्ठे ‘behind, from behind’).
